 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרוֺעֵר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** probably a tree or bush; ==juniper== ? (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***juniper*** (or ***cypress ?*** see [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]), so [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB 358</sup> [[BDB#Rob|Rob]]<sup>BR ii. 124</sup>; on formative see [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 162</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 160</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרוֺעֵר בַּמִּדְבָּר‎</span> [[Jer.48.6|Jer 48:6]], + [[Jer.17.6|Jer 17:6]], where read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֹעֵר בָּעֲרָבָה‎</span> (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְעָר‎</span>; &gt; [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] and others conversely, read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְעָר‎</span> [[Jer.48.6|Jer 48:6]]).
